name: ucdp_conflict_binary
title: UCDP Conflict Events (in Africa)
description: Binary indicating areas of conflict event based on UCDP GED Polygons v1.1.
details: Definition of ucdp violence type can be found: http://www.pcr.uu.se/research/ucdp/definitions/

extract_types_info.sum: count of pixels where conflict occured per unit of analysis
extract_types_info.count: total count of pixels per unit of analysis

extras.citation: Croicu, Mihai and Ralph Sundberg, 2012, 'UCDP GED Conflict Polygons Dataset', Department of Peace and Conflict Research, Uppsala University
